TopicTitle: I hope the game will support older CPUs? :-)

Articles.Content:
The fact that you will have to upgrade the RAM or replace the GPU is acceptable, but I hope it will not be more resource consuming than CyberPunk, my computer is from 2017, I had to install a special patch to run the game on my scrap metal that I have

CPU i5-4460 @ 3.2 Ghz
8 GB RAM kingston
GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti

I'm sorry, but nobody knows anything about system requirements yet... other than they're trying to get it to work on the greatest variety possible.

Hopefully you can have a playable experience.
You could probably get a used i7-4790 which is compatible with your current motherboard and get a bit more oomph, 4460 is seriously underpowered even by 2017 standards.
